allPostsData.title: Why Product Vision Should Trump Market Demands: A Contrarian View
allPostsData.description: In the dynamic world of product development, there’s a counterintuitive truth that many of us learn through experience: sometimes, less feedback is more. As a product engineer and ex-founder in the thick of development cycles, I’ve realised that while customer input is valuable, it shouldn’t be the sole driver of product development.
allPostsData.highlight: People don’t know what they want until you show it to them.

allPostsData.title: How to Do Great Work: Insights from Paul Graham
allPostsData.description: Paul Graham's insights on achieving significant accomplishments provide a structured yet flexible roadmap. By combining ambition, curiosity, hard work, and a keen eye for opportunities, anyone can elevate their work to new heights. Great work is not about following a rigid formula but about adapting these principles to your unique path and continuously striving for excellence.
allPostsData.highlight: Ambition and curiosity are the cornerstones of great work.
